item.title: Trump calls for resignation of Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook
item.description: The president’s call appears to be his latest effort to influence the central bank board as he demands lower interest rates.

item.title: Democrats in California sprint toward passage of redistricting legislation
item.description: The action in California comes in response to a Republican-led move in Texas to draw a congressional map more favorable to the GOP.
